casebody.data:
Erin KEENA
v.
CEDAR STREET INVESTMENTS, LLC, d/b/a Draught, a Domestic for Profit, LLC, and John Doe Employee and/or Agent, jointly and severally, directly and vicariously No. 73P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Daniel C. Flint, Attorney at Law, for Keena, Erin. Jeffrey S. Bolster, Charlotte, Melissa R. Monroe, Attorneys at Law, for Cedar Street Investments, LLC, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 13th of March 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
